hero.title: Smooth sailing to
hero.subtitle: Generate SEO-optimized articles that actually rank. Our AI creates human-quality content tailored to your keywords and audience.

problem.label: The problem
problem.title: SEO content is broken.
problem.subtitle: You know the drill. Hours of research. Endless writing. And still, your content sounds robotic, ranks poorly, or both.

solution.title: Content that works while you sleep.

features.title: Everything you need to dominate search.
features.subtitle: Powerful tools to automate your content strategy.

feature1.title: AI Content Generation
feature1.description: Articles that match your brand voice, target your keywords, and engage your readers. Every single time.

feature2.title: Smart Keyword Research

feature3.description: Set your schedule. We write, optimize, and publish automatically to WordPress, Webflow, and more.

feature4.description: Native content in English, French, Spanish, and 20+ languages. No awkward translations.

howItWorks.title: From zero to ranking in three steps.
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes and watch your traffic grow.

step1.title: Connect your site
step1.description: Link your website and Google Search Console. We'll analyze your current performance and opportunities.

step2.title: Configure your preferences
step2.description: Set your target keywords, brand voice, publishing schedule, and content goals.

step3.title: Watch your traffic grow
step3.description: Autopilot takes over. We generate, optimize, and publish content while you focus on your business.

step4.title: Watch rankings grow
step4.description: Track your progress as you climb the search results.

pricing.label: Pricing

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: For growing businesses serious about SEO.

q1.question: How is RankCruise different from other AI writing tools?
q1.answer: Unlike generic AI writers, RankCruise is built specifically for SEO. We combine keyword research, competitor analysis, and search intent optimization into every article. The result? Content that ranks, not just content that exists.

q2.question: Will Google penalize AI-generated content?
q2.answer: Google's guidelines focus on quality, not authorship. Our AI creates helpful, accurate, human-like content that follows E-E-A-T principles. Many of our users' articles rank on page one.

q3.question: Can I edit the articles before publishing?
q3.answer: Absolutely. Every article goes through your review queue before publishing. Edit, approve, or regenerate—you're always in control.

q4.question: What languages do you support?
q4.answer: We support native content creation in 20+ languages including English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, and more. This isn't translation—it's native writing.

q5.question: How long before I see results?
q5.answer: Most users see ranking improvements within 2-3 months. SEO is a long game, but consistent high-quality content accelerates results significantly.

q6.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q6.answer: Yes. No contracts, no commitments. Cancel anytime from your dashboard. We're confident you'll want to stay.

cta.title: Ready to set sail for better rankings?
cta.subtitle: Join 500+ businesses already growing their organic traffic with RankCruise.
cta.note: No credit card required. 14-day free trial.

footer.description: Smooth sailing to better rankings. AI-powered SEO content built for businesses serious about organic growth.
